text: nam (iprahimakiya) avarukku is'hakkaiyum (avarutaiya makan) ya'akupaiyum (cantatikalakat) tantarul purintom. Ivarkal anaivaraiyum nam nerana valiyil celuttinom. Itarku munnar nuhaiyum, avarutaiya cantatikalakiya tavut, sulaiman, aiyup, yusuhp, musa, harun akiyoraiyum nam nerana valiyil celuttinom. Nanmai ceypavarkalukku ivvare nam (nar)kuli alikkirom
